messages.title: Delivering opportunity for everyone.
messages.content: The Lib Dems will end the scandal of mental health being treated as secondary to physical health. The Lib Dems will cut Income Tax for workers by raising the tax-free allowance further £400 a year to help with the cost of living. The Lib Dems will ensure every child is taught by a qualified teacher and protect the schools budget.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: End the scandal of mental health being treated as secondary to physical health.
Cut Income Tax for workers by raising the tax-free allowance further £400 a year to help with the cost of living.
Ensure every child is taught by a qualified teacher and protect the schools budget.

mentions.candidate: David Kendall and the local Lib Dem Team working hard here all year round!
mentions.tacticalSituation: The Lib Dems have helped rebuild our economy & delivered.

issues.economy: The Lib Dems will finish balancing the books so that our children are not saddled with debt.
issues.education: The Lib Dems will ensure every child is taught by a qualified teacher and protect the schools budget.
issues.health: The Lib Dems will end the scandal of mental health being treated as secondary to physical health.

housing.content: The Lib Dems will guarantee the NHS budget rises every year by at least £8 billion by 2020 through our 'triple lock' guarantee.

leaflet.personalStatement: David Kendall - a local champion for Brentwood & Ongar

images.caption: A better deal for bus & rail users
Part night lighting - it doesn't have to be like this
